title: Johannes van Heerden
text:
Johannes Petrus van Heerden (born 9 December 1986) is a Romanian <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player of South African background. He plays as <a href="Lock%20%28rugby%20union%29">lock</a>, and occasionally flanker.
He plays for <a href="SuperLiga%20%28rugby%29">SuperLiga</a> club <a href="CSM%20Baia%20Mare%20%28rugby%29">Baia Mare</a> and <a href="Bucure%C8%99ti">București</a> based <a href="European%20Challenge%20Cup">European Challenge Cup</a> side the <a href="Bucure%C8%99ti%20Wolves">Wolves</a>. Van Heerden also plays for Romania's national team the <a href="Romania%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Oaks</a>.
